attacks.name: Wrap
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Sonicboom
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Weakness or Resistance.

abilities.name: Form Change
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for another Deoxys and switch it with Deoxys. (Any cards attached to Deoxys, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokémon.) If you do, put Deoxys on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward. You can’t use more than 1 Form Change Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Crystal Laser
attacks.effect: During your next turn, Deoxys’s attacks do 40 more damage to the Defending Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.effect: As long as Flygon has any Energy attached to it, the Retreat Cost for Flygon is 0.

attacks.name: Sand Pit
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon can’t retreat during your opponent’s next turn.

abilities.name: Reactive Barrier
abilities.effect: As long as Mew has any React Energy cards attached to it, prevent all effects, excluding damage, done to Mew by attacks from your opponent’s Pokémon.

attacks.name: Psyshock
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

abilities.name: Energy Trans
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), move a Grass Energy card attached to 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon. This power can’t be used if Sceptile is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Tail Rap
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Smokescreen
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent’s next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Sky Uppercut
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Resistance.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

cards.name: Pokémon Fan Club
cards.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Super Hypno Wave
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Spark
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Shell Retreat
abilities.effect: As long as Squirtle has any Energy cards attached to it, damage done to Squirtle by an opponent’s attack is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Shining Claws
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Expand
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, any damage done to Wobbuffet is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

abilities.name: Form Change
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for another Deoxys ex and switch it with Deoxys ex. (Any cards attached to Deoxys ex, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokémon.) If you do, put Deoxys ex on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward. You can’t use more than 1 Form Change Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Fastwave
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokémon.
